faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Everything you need to know before getting started

q1.question: How much does it cost to start?
q1.answer: Our projects start from $150 for basic solutions. The final investment depends on scope, complexity and deadlines. We offer free diagnosis to understand your needs and create a personalized proposal with clear ROI.

q2.question: How long does it take to see results?
q2.answer: Simple projects can be live in 7-15 days. More complex projects take 1 to 3 months. We work with weekly deliveries (sprints), so you see constant progress and can adjust course at any time.

q3.question: What size companies do you serve?
q3.answer: We serve from startups and small businesses to established companies. Our approach adapts to your moment: if you're starting, we focus on MVP and validation. If you're already growing, we focus on scale and automation.
